alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 2:35PM CDT until June 02 at 9:25AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Walnut River...including El Dorado, Augusta, Winfield, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walnut River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Secondary roads in the vicinity of Augusta begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. Then continue falling to 7.3 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Walnut River Augusta 23.0 25.4 Wed 2 pm CDT 11.3 6.8 7.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
